tldr: Affected versions of the package expose a Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability due to improper sanitization of certain fields in the control panel, which allows attacker-controlled user input to execute malicious scripts.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `statamic/cms` library to a patch version.
